name: One Night with Spong 2: Rehyrdated!
description:
THIS IS A JOKE GAME!!!!

Remember the announcement I made here, about a new ONwS game? Well, that new game was gonna be a remake of ONwS 1, 2, and 3 in one package (think Super Mario All-Stars). But I've decided to release them each seperately to save time, so here we are!

HOW TO PLAY:

When Spong appears, shock him.

When Scooter (Fish guy) appears, click on him.

When Rapist (Squidward) appears, search for him via cameras or movement.

Whe Honker (Clown emote) appears, use the mask.

CREDITS:

Me - Creator of ONwS.

Scott Cawthon - Creator of FNaF

ALSO CHECK OUT:

https://shoodigity.itch.io/spong-2 THE ORIGINAL GAME!

https://itch.io/c/2074959/one-night-with-spong-full-series THE REST OF THE SERIES!
